text: Captain Nemo (; later identified as an Indian, Prince Dakkar) is a fictional character created by the French novelist Jules Verne (1828â€“1905). Nemo appears in two of Verne's science-fiction books, Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea (1870) and The Mysterious Island (1875). He is also in a play written by Verne and Adolphe d'Ennery, Journey Through the Impossible (1882). Category:Characters in written fiction Category:Jules Verne
title: Captain Nemo
